page.title: 11GANDERLAND FARM
page.content:
Total area.................126acres Arable......................78acres Grassland...................50acres Woodland.....................8acres Crops....wheat,barley,oats,silage. Uses of silage...food for sheep and cattle. Farm Machinery...3tractors,1car. Equipment for....hay-making,baling, fertilising,drilling,ploughing. Animals.....7sheep,100fattening lambs, 54beef cattle,1dog,1cat. Buildings...2barns,2cattle-sheds,1farm house. People...5live on farm, 2work on farm, 1employed.
CLASS 2
